description:
The aim of DataStore is to model and access data in a more transparent and immediate way than is available with	relational databases. Relationships are explicitly stored rather than being implied by shared data values.
		
	    DataStore is currently distributed as a .Net assembly and Windows Runtime component.
		
		This version is a beta release.
		
		DataStore needs to be activated. This can be done from the Browser or Designer.
summary: A database that models data as a digraph
author: Semata Ltd
